title: Jay Fulton joins Wigan on loan from Swansea for rest of season
description: Swansea City midfielder Jay Fulton has joined Wigan Athletic on loan until the end of the season.
content: The 23-year-old's minutes had been limited at the Liberty Stadium, with Fulton only making three appearances for the first team this campaign.Wigan manager Paul Cook said: "Jay will fit right in here. It is a good move for him and we are really looking forward to working with him and integrating him into our squad."Fulton could make his debut for his new side in the FA Cup fourth-round clash against West Ham.The Scot moved to Swansea from Falkirk four years ago but has played fewer than 30 matches for the Welsh side in that time.He joins a Wigan side who are five points clear at the top of League One as they push for a return to the Championship.
